kaf-ha-ya-ain-sad
dhik'ru raḥmati rabbika ʿabdahu zakariyyā
idh nādā rabbahu nidāan khafiyyan
qāla rabbi innī wahana al-ʿaẓmu minnī wa-ish'taʿala al-rasu shayban walam akun biduʿāika rabbi shaqiyyan
wa-innī khif'tu al-mawāliya min warāī wakānati im'ra-atī ʿāqiran fahab lī min ladunka waliyyan
yarithunī wayarithu min āli yaʿqūba wa-ij'ʿalhu rabbi raḍiyyan
yāzakariyyā innā nubashiruka bighulāmin us'muhu yaḥyā lam najʿal lahu min qablu samiyyan
qāla rabbi annā yakūnu lī ghulāmun wakānati im'ra-atī ʿāqiran waqad balaghtu mina al-kibari ʿitiyyan
qāla kadhālika qāla rabbuka huwa ʿalayya hayyinun waqad khalaqtuka min qablu walam taku shayan
qāla rabbi ij'ʿal lī āyatan qāla āyatuka allā tukallima al-nāsa thalātha layālin sawiyyan
fakharaja ʿalā qawmihi mina al-miḥ'rābi fa-awḥā ilayhim an sabbiḥū buk'ratan waʿashiyyan
yāyaḥyā khudhi al-kitāba biquwwatin waātaynāhu al-ḥuk'ma ṣabiyyan
waḥanānan min ladunnā wazakatan wakāna taqiyyan
wabarran biwālidayhi walam yakun jabbāran ʿaṣiyyan
wasalāmun ʿalayhi yawma wulida wayawma yamūtu wayawma yub'ʿathu ḥayyan
wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi maryama idhi intabadhat min ahlihā makānan sharqiyyan
fa-ittakhadhat min dūnihim ḥijāban fa-arsalnā ilayhā rūḥanā fatamathala lahā basharan sawiyyan
qālat innī aʿūdhu bil-raḥmāni minka in kunta taqiyyan
qāla innamā anā rasūlu rabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulāman zakiyyan
qālat annā yakūnu lī ghulāmun walam yamsasnī basharun walam aku baghiyyan
qāla kadhāliki qāla rabbuki huwa ʿalayya hayyinun walinajʿalahu āyatan lilnnāsi waraḥmatan minnā wakāna amran maqḍiyyan
faḥamalathu fa-intabadhat bihi makānan qaṣiyyan
fa-ajāahā al-makhāḍu ilā jidh'ʿi al-nakhlati qālat yālaytanī mittu qabla hādhā wakuntu nasyan mansiyyan
fanādāhā min taḥtihā allā taḥzanī qad jaʿala rabbuki taḥtaki sariyyan
wahuzzī ilayki bijidh'ʿi al-nakhlati tusāqiṭ ʿalayki ruṭaban janiyyan
fakulī wa-ish'rabī waqarrī ʿaynan fa-immā tarayinna mina al-bashari aḥadan faqūlī innī nadhartu lilrraḥmāni ṣawman falan ukallima al-yawma insiyyan
fa-atat bihi qawmahā taḥmiluhu qālū yāmaryamu laqad ji'ti shayan fariyyan
yāukh'ta hārūna mā kāna abūki im'ra-a sawin wamā kānat ummuki baghiyyan
fa-ashārat ilayhi qālū kayfa nukallimu man kāna fī al-mahdi ṣabiyyan
qāla innī ʿabdu al-lahi ātāniya al-kitāba wajaʿalanī nabiyyan
wajaʿalanī mubārakan ayna mā kuntu wa-awṣānī bil-ṣalati wal-zakati mā dum'tu ḥayyan
wabarran biwālidatī walam yajʿalnī jabbāran shaqiyyan
wal-salāmu ʿalayya yawma wulidttu wayawma amūtu wayawma ub'ʿathu ḥayyan
dhālika ʿīsā ub'nu maryama qawla al-ḥaqi alladhī fīhi yamtarūna
mā kāna lillahi an yattakhidha min waladin sub'ḥānahu idhā qaḍā amran fa-innamā yaqūlu lahu kun fayakūnu
wa-inna al-laha rabbī warabbukum fa-uʿ'budūhu hādhā ṣirāṭun mus'taqīmun
fa-ikh'talafa al-aḥzābu min baynihim fawaylun lilladhīna kafarū min mashhadi yawmin ʿaẓīmin
asmiʿ bihim wa-abṣir yawma yatūnanā lākini al-ẓālimūna al-yawma fī ḍalālin mubīnin
wa-andhir'hum yawma al-ḥasrati idh quḍiya al-amru wahum fī ghaflatin wahum lā yu'minūna
innā naḥnu narithu al-arḍa waman ʿalayhā wa-ilaynā yur'jaʿūna
wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi ib'rāhīma innahu kāna ṣiddīqan nabiyyan
idh qāla li-abīhi yāabati lima taʿbudu mā lā yasmaʿu walā yub'ṣiru walā yugh'nī ʿanka shayan
yāabati innī qad jāanī mina al-ʿil'mi mā lam yatika fa-ittabiʿ'nī ahdika ṣirāṭan sawiyyan
yāabati lā taʿbudi al-shayṭāna inna al-shayṭāna kāna lilrraḥmāni ʿaṣiyyan
yāabati innī akhāfu an yamassaka ʿadhābun mina al-raḥmāni fatakūna lilshayṭāni waliyyan
qāla arāghibun anta ʿan ālihatī yāib'rāhīmu la-in lam tantahi la-arjumannaka wa-uh'jur'nī maliyyan
qāla salāmun ʿalayka sa-astaghfiru laka rabbī innahu kāna bī ḥafiyyan
wa-aʿtazilukum wamā tadʿūna min dūni al-lahi wa-adʿū rabbī ʿasā allā akūna biduʿāi rabbī shaqiyyan
falammā iʿ'tazalahum wamā yaʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi wahabnā lahu is'ḥāqa wayaʿqūba wakullan jaʿalnā nabiyyan
wawahabnā lahum min raḥmatinā wajaʿalnā lahum lisāna ṣid'qin ʿaliyyan
wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi mūsā innahu kāna mukh'laṣan wakāna rasūlan nabiyyan
wanādaynāhu min jānibi al-ṭūri al-aymani waqarrabnāhu najiyyan
wawahabnā lahu min raḥmatinā akhāhu hārūna nabiyyan
wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi is'māʿīla innahu kāna ṣādiqa al-waʿdi wakāna rasūlan nabiyyan
wakāna yamuru ahlahu bil-ṣalati wal-zakati wakāna ʿinda rabbihi marḍiyyan
wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi id'rīsa innahu kāna ṣiddīqan nabiyyan
warafaʿnāhu makānan ʿaliyyan

ulāika alladhīna anʿama al-lahu ʿalayhim mina al-nabiyīna min dhurriyyati ādama wamimman ḥamalnā maʿa nūḥin wamin dhurriyyati ib'rāhīma wa-is'rāīla wamimman hadaynā wa-ij'tabaynā idhā tut'lā ʿalayhim āyātu al-raḥmāni kharrū sujjadan wabukiyyan
fakhalafa min baʿdihim khalfun aḍāʿū al-ṣalata wa-ittabaʿū al-shahawāti fasawfa yalqawna ghayyan
illā man tāba waāmana waʿamila ṣāliḥan fa-ulāika yadkhulūna al-janata walā yuẓ'lamūna shayan
jannāti ʿadnin allatī waʿada al-raḥmānu ʿibādahu bil-ghaybi innahu kāna waʿduhu matiyyan
lā yasmaʿūna fīhā laghwan illā salāman walahum riz'quhum fīhā buk'ratan waʿashiyyan
til'ka al-janatu allatī nūrithu min ʿibādinā man kāna taqiyyan
wamā natanazzalu illā bi-amri rabbika lahu mā bayna aydīnā wamā khalfanā wamā bayna dhālika wamā kāna rabbuka nasiyyan
rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā fa-uʿ'bud'hu wa-iṣ'ṭabir liʿibādatihi hal taʿlamu lahu samiyyan
wayaqūlu al-insānu a-idhā mā mittu lasawfa ukh'raju ḥayyan
awalā yadhkuru al-insānu annā khalaqnāhu min qablu walam yaku shayan
fawarabbika lanaḥshurannahum wal-shayāṭīna thumma lanuḥ'ḍirannahum ḥawla jahannama jithiyyan
thumma lananziʿanna min kulli shīʿatin ayyuhum ashaddu ʿalā al-raḥmāni ʿitiyyan
thumma lanaḥnu aʿlamu bi-alladhīna hum awlā bihā ṣiliyyan
wa-in minkum illā wāriduhā kāna ʿalā rabbika ḥatman maqḍiyyan
thumma nunajjī alladhīna ittaqaw wanadharu al-ẓālimīna fīhā jithiyyan
wa-idhā tut'lā ʿalayhim āyātunā bayyinātin qāla alladhīna kafarū lilladhīna āmanū ayyu al-farīqayni khayrun maqāman wa-aḥsanu nadiyyan
wakam ahlaknā qablahum min qarnin hum aḥsanu athāthan wari'yan
qul man kāna fī al-ḍalālati falyamdud lahu al-raḥmānu maddan ḥattā idhā ra-aw mā yūʿadūna immā al-ʿadhāba wa-immā al-sāʿata fasayaʿlamūna man huwa sharrun makānan wa-aḍʿafu jundan
wayazīdu al-lahu alladhīna ih'tadaw hudan wal-bāqiyātu al-ṣāliḥātu khayrun ʿinda rabbika thawāban wakhayrun maraddan
afara-ayta alladhī kafara biāyātinā waqāla laūtayanna mālan wawaladan
aṭṭalaʿa al-ghayba ami ittakhadha ʿinda al-raḥmāni ʿahdan
kallā sanaktubu mā yaqūlu wanamuddu lahu mina al-ʿadhābi maddan
wanarithuhu mā yaqūlu wayatīnā fardan
wa-ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi ālihatan liyakūnū lahum ʿizzan
kallā sayakfurūna biʿibādatihim wayakūnūna ʿalayhim ḍiddan
alam tara annā arsalnā al-shayāṭīna ʿalā al-kāfirīna ta-uzzuhum azzan
falā taʿjal ʿalayhim innamā naʿuddu lahum ʿaddan
yawma naḥshuru al-mutaqīna ilā al-raḥmāni wafdan
wanasūqu al-muj'rimīna ilā jahannama wir'dan
lā yamlikūna al-shafāʿata illā mani ittakhadha ʿinda al-raḥmāni ʿahdan
waqālū ittakhadha al-raḥmānu waladan
laqad ji'tum shayan iddan
takādu al-samāwātu yatafaṭṭarna min'hu watanshaqqu al-arḍu watakhirru al-jibālu haddan
an daʿaw lilrraḥmāni waladan
wamā yanbaghī lilrraḥmāni an yattakhidha waladan
in kullu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi illā ātī al-raḥmāni ʿabdan
laqad aḥṣāhum waʿaddahum ʿaddan
wakulluhum ātīhi yawma al-qiyāmati fardan
inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti sayajʿalu lahumu al-raḥmānu wuddan
fa-innamā yassarnāhu bilisānika litubashira bihi al-mutaqīna watundhira bihi qawman luddan
wakam ahlaknā qablahum min qarnin hal tuḥissu min'hum min aḥadin aw tasmaʿu lahum rik'zan
